name: Cheating Brad
description:
Cheating Brad is a stealth puzzle game where you play as Brad and you try to ace the test. Unfortunately, you don’t know anything so you must cheat by copying from the other students while avoiding multiple obstacles that will hinder your quest to perfection.

Made by Chooable ROLES TASKSMEMBERS Game Designer/Lead Programmer Gameplay, Mechanics, Game Design Document, UI, Sounds, QA, Level DesignerXyvceAsst.
